rehash.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to use the same ideas again in a new form that is not really different or better â€“ used to show disapproval
rehash.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He simply rehashed the same story.
rehash.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to repeat something that was discussed earlier, especially in an annoying way
rehash.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: This issue has been rehashed so many times already.
